mapper.select: SELECT sb.source_seq AS sourceSeq ,cc.code_nm AS langNm ,cc.code AS langCd ,sb.user_seq AS userSeq ,wu.user_id AS userId ,sb.title ,sb.content ,DATE_FORMAT(sb.reg_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS regDate FROM source_board sb LEFT OUTER JOIN white_user wu ON wu.user_seq = sb.user_seq LEFT OUTER JOIN cmm_code cc ON sb.lang_cd = cc.code WHERE sb.source_seq = #{sourceSeq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO source_board(user_seq, lang_cd, title, content, reg_date) VALUES( #{userSeq}, #{langCd}, #{title}, #{content}, NOW() )
